settings.title: Supercharge Gyms & Coaches
settings.subheading: The only smart fitness device that empowers you, instead of replacing you.

settings.text:
Spend More Time OnÂ Coaching Your Clients At Scale

And Less Time On Admin

settings.title: Connect & Engage in Real Time
settings.text: Circolo enhances your live training sessions with your clients. Our embedded camera and reflective mirror allows you to see your client's full body, and allow them see their form so they can make correction in real-time.

settings.title: Effortlessly Track & Measure Client Progress
settings.text: Get detailed metrics on compliance and movement quality for every client program you create, so you can make quality decisions about your client's next progression, and use your coaching skills to move them forward.

settings.title: Self-Branded Video Exercise Demos
settings.text: You have the flexibility to curate workouts on YouTube, upload your own videos, or use our library of over 500+ pre-loaded strength and conditioning exercise videos.
Stop the time-sucking admin tasks that pull you away from your clients and start providing a professional, one-to-one, personalized coaching experience that scales your business.

settings.title: Powerful Tech, Simplified Experience
settings.text: Your clients can easily join any live sessions or start any pre-planned workout with just one tap. No more admin work to manage Zoom links or technical difficulties!

settings.title: Self Branded Exercise Videos
settings.text: Store all of your coaching videos privately within Circolo, or link directly to videos hosted on YouTube to create your own video library.

settings.title: Data Driven Coaching
settings.text: We make it easy to track exercise history and metrics, so both you and your clients can log results and visualize progress towards specific goals over time.

settings.title: How can I learn more about this?
settings.text: Please fill out this form or email support@dongmi.ai.

settings.title: How do my clients get this mirror?
settings.text: We will handle all the shipping and delivery to your clients!
